adHeader: Translator: English to Latin, Latin to English
adDetails: You may have noticed that Latin isn't as dead as reported, e.g. the spells of Harry Potter. If you have a Latin quote that you can't decipher or something of yours you want in Latin, e.g. a love poem, possum te adjuvare (I can help). We can do all business by e-mail or snail mail. I charge 20 cents a word for the translated text. Minimum payment is $2.00 for ten words and fewer.You can call me at show contact info. If you want a sample of my work, I can send you an excerpt from my "Libellus Sapientiae Felium", The Little Book of Cat Wisdom. Pax. John Sullivan John Sullivan
